name: Netflix & Chill
description:
This quick 2-page GM-less Duet game is an exploration into Flirting and syncing vibes with each other.  

Players will simultaneously Flirt using a simple mechanic pulled from Everyone Is John to gauge how strongly they flirt with each other. Will the player efforts match and the awkwardness of the date fade away or will it be a ill-fit? 

Grab a friend, partner, or cool stranger to see if you can both Netflix & Chill.

**Please use with Safety Tools regardless of the person you share this gaming experience with**
